page.title: 12SHEERNESS-THE FIRE BRIGADE
page.content: ALTHOUGH THERE ARE ONLY THREE FIRE ENGINES BASED IN SHEERNESS THEY HAVE SAVED MANY LIVES.THE ENGINES HOLD{400 {GALLONS}OF WATER AND TWENTY LENGTHS OF HOSE. THE FIREMEN ALWAYS HAVE THEIR SPECIAL CLOTHES READY FOR AN EMERGENCY AND WORK EVERY DAY NONSTOP.THERE ARE 12 FIREMEN,SO 6 WORK EVERY 4 HOURS AND THEN CHANGE TO THE OTHER 6 FOR 4 HOURS. {THE BIGGEST FIRE IN SHEERNESS}WAS IN THE 1950S,WHEN THE CO-OP STORE CAUGHT LIGHT. THE{FIRE STATION}IS NOT MANNED DURING THE NIGHT,BUT FIREMEN ARE ON CALL 24 HOURS A DAY AND ARE SUMMONED TO THE STATION BY PERSONAL BLEEPER. EVEN IN THE WORST WEATHER FIREMEN GET THROUGH AND ONLY VERY RARELY ARE DELAYED OR PREVENTED FROM ATTENDING A FIRE.
